translations: 删除，删去，划掉（delete 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: This will take you to a form where you'll need to confirm each of the services you'll be deleting.
sentences.translation: 这将带您进入一个表单，您需要在其中确认要删除的每个服务。

sentences.sentence: Deleting an object accidentally and then replacing it with a similar object will lead to unacceptable differences of the enterprise models.
sentences.translation: 意外地删除一个对象，然后用一个类似的对象替换它，将导致企业模型不可接受的差异。
